welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gladstone, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. Get ready to experience our unique culture and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the private terminal at Downtown Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as United and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Alaska and Frontier.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
